Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. "Just get your swagger back," Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Jamaal Charles was chosen for the FedEx Award over Houston's Arian Foster , the NFL's leading rusher with 1,616 yards and a 4.9-yard average, and Atlanta's Michael Vick Turner, the third-leading rusher with 1,371 yards. I had a chance to do one Kansas City Chiefs game, it was the playoff game, said CBS Sports analyst Phil Simms , who presented the award.
